label: 僧正
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: [The highest of the] three principal categories of [ecclesiastical] officials, known collectively as sōgō [the other two are Sōzu and Risshi] (p. 396). [僧綱、僧都、律師]
